name: Jude BRUNSON, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS et al., Respondents
name_abbreviation: Brunson v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Jude BRUNSON, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS et al., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 10th day of February, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal having been improvidently filed, the document is hereby regarded as a notice of appeal from the order of the Commonwealth Court. See Pa.R.A.P. 1103. As Petitioner’s allegations of error are without merit, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
Jude BRUNSON, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS et al., Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 10, 2005.
